title: DJ Sona Shirt Graphic
body:
Yo, just wondering if anyone has or knows where i can find a high res copy of the graphic on Riot's DJ Sona tee in their store.
would be greatly appreciated <3

replies.body:
138x224
I know its small as hell, but way too much effort to make it bigger and still keep it looking nice.

http://imgur.com/JLuWLVN

Haha thanks for the effort :) i appreciate someone getting back to me, but unfortunately the graphic is too small :P
Thank you for your time though friend :) <3
what size do you need, might be able to make a bigger 1
it needs to be at least 1400 tall :P
you crazy, i can do 4x at best

ahaha thanks for your help anyways :P just thought i'd ask if anyone had one :P
<3
I'm not messiah, but ill attempt to make you one
